rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for natural light and adherence to Vastu principles. The room integrates modern decor elements.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a glass partition that allows continuity while ensuring privacy during meals. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on its north wall for balanced light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact bedroom designed to host guests, featuring large east-facing windows and minimalistic contemporary design in accordance with Vastu recommendations for relaxation.

rooms.name: Utility/Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom equipped with water-saving fixtures, ensuring privacy with floor-to-ceiling window placements on the north side as per local norms.

openings.location: East and North facades of Living Room and Dining Room
openings.description: Expansive windows to maximize natural light, enhance ventilation, and adhere to both modern design trends and Vastu principles.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Room
openings.description: Provides separation while ensuring an open layout that fosters seamless flow of energy as suggested by Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east wall for ample sunlight and Vastu compliance. Includes an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with efficient fixtures, designed to maintain privacy while aligning with modern aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work or study. Features ample natural light from north-facing floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure optimal concentration.

openings.location: East wall of Master Bedroom and Study/Workroom
openings.description: Large windows to ensure a bright, airy environment in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Balcony Terrace
rooms.description: Open space overlooking the garden area with integrated seating and floor-to-ceiling window walls for panoramic views. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by ensuring open circulation of energy.

rooms.name: Playroom/Reading Nook
rooms.description: A multifunctional space designed for relaxation and indoor activities, featuring north-facing floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain an even light distribution as per Vastu.

openings.location: Balcony Terrace and Playroom/Reading Nook walls
openings.description: Expansive window design for uninterrupted views, enhanced ventilation, and compliance with local norms and Vastu principles.
